WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has reached 60 days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with reference to the currently affected versions and any necessary files.
WorkItem.Description:
Repeatable, happens every time:
 
tools-> optimize
max optimize slider
optimize
yes, lots of things have lots of selections
wait a while
proposed changes shown (either keep or discard, happens both ways)
 
Now when you are back at main rawr window if you right click a pice of gear on the right side and say equip it will not equip that gear.
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer causes some functionality to stop

Comments.Message: I believe this is related with another bug that was fixed for 2.2.6.
